Se você esta lendo isso então você muito provavelmente não tem o jogo, e você conhecer ele sem ter jogado já deve significar algo.

Praticamente o Melhor FPS que já joguei, ele tem problemas? sim ele tem, mas as oque ele tem de bom realmente faz ele valer a pena.

A dificuldade é estranha no normal ela é Normal mas no Hard ela realmente não muda quase nada você só vai morrer 2 vezes a mais e depois passar direto no Hard o Jogo Literalmente só aumenta a Vida e o Dano dos inimigos então é meio Páia.

As armas são ''Estranhas'' as vezes Incríveis como é o caso da 12, Bazuca e da Gravity Gun, e as vezes as armas são realmente boas mas MUITO Mal Utilizadas como a 'Isca' e o 'Crossbow' que pode ser facilmente substituído pelo Revolver , e outras são apenas fracas mesmo como a Pistola, e talvez fosse o caso da SMG mas ela tem muita munição em um clipe só então ela ta de boa.

Leveis (Fases) São incríveis todas as fases desse jogo tem sempre algo que faz ela diferente da anterior seja uma arma diferente que você ganha, veículos, inimigos novos ou apenas a própria fase mesmo nunca se parece com a anterior, e os Inimigos são muito bem colocados nos lugares certos onde não fica injusto e nem muito fácil nem muito impossível de saber de onde você ta levando tiro.

RAVENHOLM É A MELHOR FASE QUE EU JÁ JOGUEI EM QUALQUER JOGO!
Half Life e' una opera d'arte una pietra miliare nella storia dei video game ,una saga che trasuda umanita' un gioco diventato un culto.Non ha paragoni.

I really want to **love** this game. Its fun, I enjoy the story and this game was the hallmark for many games to come. But I cant bring myself to it. 

Dont get me wrong, I enjoyed playing this game. But the one thing that ground up my gears was the lack of indicators. Where to progress, where to move on, what button to push, etc. I dont like having my hand held excessively but i would have really appreciated some help. I didnt want to look anything up to preserve the experience but in some areas I either got so irritated that I had to look it up, Or I just noclipped to the next area, Especially with some of the vehicle sections.

Half Life 2 is a fun game but if you have a smooth brain like myself you might have a hard time.

Half-life 2 is a fantastic physics based puzzle game. Its greatness is immeasurable. Personally, I feel this game looses some of the horror elements from the first game which I really loved, but it is still a great game nonetheless. It expands on the universe from the first game in a brilliant way that made me completely invested in the story. The physics based puzzles, inspired in part by Trespasser, are fun to think through and using the gravity gun is a blast. Ultimately, if you loved the first game, this is a worthy addition to your library.

One of the best shooters of all time, still looks great considering its age. 
Paved the way for modern gaming with groundbreaking physics(at the time) and guns that have weight and feel satisfying to use. The game throws you in just deep enough to keep you engaged but never leaves you underprepared. !0/10 As close to a perfect shooter as it gets.

Half-Life 1'de Black Mesa'da yolunda gitmeyen deneyler sonucunda yaratıkların dünyaya gelmesiyle bir kaos başlamıştı ama Gordon Freeman'in çabası ile her şey daha kötüye gitmeden engellenir.

Half-Life 2'de Gordon Freeman birden kendini Şehir 17'de bulur, Şehir 17'deki insanlar tarafından büyük saygı görmeye başlamış fakat yine yolunda gitmeyen bir portal deneyinde rastgele etrafa ışınlanarak kimliği açığa çıkmıştır ve Combineler onu öldürmeye çalışmaktadır.

I may be 16 years late, but now I can say with all confidence that this is a great experience, mostly because of the characters and the wacky but interesting NPC's and enemies. The ride is full of unexpected events, like Ravenholm, which dips it's toes into some horror aspects from the genre; and the juiced-up Gravity Gun on the last level. Oh, spoiler alert... is there a need for alerting a game mechanic from a 2004 game?  
Ah well, the point I'm trying to bring here is that the game offers a variety of fun game mechanics, stages, weapons, enemies, characters and segments that keep the gameplay away from stagnating.
The atmosphere kept me immersed, the rythm is the right speed and it contains very charming graphics because of it's age, which keeps the visuals nice and constant throughout  the game, even with the mechanical parts overtaking or replacing normal buildings or plazas. 
The world is lived-in an believable within the game's context, and it makes it all the more fun watching and interacting with the different environments the game has to offer. 
And of course, the story; being one of the most praised game series of all time, I have to say... It's good, although I haven't gotten that sensation of being a masterpiece, which I believe it derives from me missing out from the time the game was released, so I don't really hold any nostalgia and living in post-Half-Life world, I think the magic of this game being so unique and groundbreaking has been replicated in other media, so I actually feel envy for those who got to experience it in it's prime time. But anyways, the storyline is linear and it works as a strength for the overall narrative, since you can experience a clear vision for the characters, world and events that make up the Half-Life series chronology. Since I had a different idea of what Half-Life was, I found myself constantly surprised and charmed by the direction of the game's story, mainly because of the actions of the characters and the aliens being incorporated in what once seemed to be a normal world.
The cliffhanger at the end left me kind of annoyed, but I guess it's what you've got to do to spark interest in some meaningful way or make a 30 hr game encompassing every bit of style and storytelling the Half-Life series is known fo, but I digress. 
Even with the cliffhanger, I was entertained all the way, from beginning to end, and as an amateur completionist, I've got to say that chasing every achievement added way more to the experience, so if you like aiming for that perfect game without being annoyed from those impossible or random achievements, this entry is perfect for you!
Except maybe for the Lambda Locator, which will either be ignored or cripple OCD individuals even further.
That's it. The review is finished. I can now enjoy my sleep. And I hope you do too. Goodbye...

Half-Life 2 - это игра которая полностью изменила игровую индустрию, в частности шутеры. Это не просто игра где тебе нужно идти прямо, одстреливая головы комбайнов и "зомбайнов" (да я знаю что это не смешная шутка), при этом собирая аптечки, это еще: интересный геймлей, прорывная физика, захватывающий сюжет, а также по "канону" игра без кат-сцен. Если вы еще не играли в эту игру, почему вы еще сидите и читаете этот обзор, бегом исправляйте этот казус, пока еще длится летняя распродажа. Всем приятной игры !

作为一款2004年的FPS可以说半条命做到了当时那个年代的极致，即使放到今天来讲，游戏的代入感，剧情，NPC的非重复对话 放到与现在fps游戏相比也绝对是位于前列的。这部游戏打完我会继续把后续几步打完，对于今年最新的版本，如果我有VR设备，必定会入手，强烈推荐给fps脑残粉
